demolition

类 BombGuy

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Guy
      • demolition.BombGuy

  • public class BombGuy
extends Guy

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      boolean putBomb
      Record whether the bomber placed a bomb, the default is false

      • 从类继承的字段 demolition.Guy

        beKilled, canMove, moveDown, moveLeft, moveRight, moveUp, SECONDS_BETWEEN_RENDERED, sprite, sprite1, sprite2, sprite3, sprite4, spriteDown1, spriteDown2, spriteDown3, spriteDown4, spriteLeft1, spriteLeft2, spriteLeft3, spriteLeft4, spriteRight1, spriteRight2, spriteRight3, spriteRight4, spriteUp1, spriteUp2, spriteUp3, spriteUp4, x, y

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BombGuy()
      Constructor for a BombGuy
      BombGuy(int x, int y)
      Constructor for a BombGuy, requires the location of the bombGuy (X and Y value)

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void direction(App app)
      This method is used to determine the current image of bombGuy At the same time restrict the bomber's re-movement
      void reachGoal(App app)
      This method is used to detect whether bombGuy has reached the target If it reaches, load to the next level or declare the game victory according to the situation
      void tick(App app)
      This method is used to determine the movement of bombGuy in each frame, and move according to the button pressed At the same time, judge whether bombGuy can move

      • 从类继承的方法 demolition.Guy

        canMove, draw, drawGuy, getX, getY

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • putBomb

        public boolean putBomb
        Record whether the bomber placed a bomb, the default is false

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BombGuy

        public BombGuy()
        Constructor for a BombGuy

      • BombGuy

        public BombGuy(int x,
               int y)
        Constructor for a BombGuy, requires the location of the bombGuy (X and Y value)
        参数:
        x - the location of the bombGuy (X value)
        y - the location of the bombGuy (Y value)

    • 方法详细资料

      • direction

        public void direction(App app)
        This method is used to determine the current image of bombGuy At the same time restrict the bomber's re-movement
        指定者:
        direction 在类中 Guy
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • tick

        public void tick(App app)
        This method is used to determine the movement of bombGuy in each frame, and move according to the button pressed At the same time, judge whether bombGuy can move
        指定者:
        tick 在类中 Guy
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program

      • reachGoal

        public void reachGoal(App app)
        This method is used to detect whether bombGuy has reached the target If it reaches, load to the next level or declare the game victory according to the situation
        参数:
        app - The app used to load the program
